select t.id, t.staff_name, t.staff_code, t.begin_time, t.end_time, t.train_period, t.train_learn_period, t.train_learn_score, t.score, t.train_type, t.train_company, t.certificate_name, t.certificate_code, t.remarks, CONCAT(t.modifier_name, " 于 " ,t.MODIFIED_TIME," 更新") updateDesc from ( SELECT f.id, s.staff_name, s.staff_code, f.begin_time, f.end_time, f.train_period, f.train_learn_period, f.train_learn_score, f.score, ( SELECT s.label FROM sys_dict_item s WHERE s.id = f.train_type and s.type='TRAIN_TYPE' ) train_type, f.train_company, f.certificate_name, f.certificate_code, f.remarks, ( SELECT u.USER_NAME FROM mp_user u WHERE u.id = f.MODIFIER_CODE ) modifier_name, f.MODIFIED_TIME, ( SELECT u.USER_NAME FROM mp_user u WHERE u.id = f.CREATOR_CODE ) create_name, f.CREATED_TIME, f.STAFF_ID FROM mp_stafftrain f LEFT JOIN mp_staff s ON s.ID = f.STAFF_id LEFT JOIN mp_userpost u on u.USER_ID =s.USER_ID AND u.MAIN_POST = 1 where 1=1 and f.del_flag=0 )t where 1=1
and CONCAT( t.staff_name, t.staff_code, t.begin_time, t.end_time, t.train_period, t.train_learn_period, t.train_learn_score, t.score, t.train_type, t.train_company, t.certificate_name, t.certificate_code, t.remarks ) LIKE concat('%',#{searchText},'%')
